title: Acct Exec.-Sales-Oregon State University - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: We are searching for Account Executives to sell, service and solicit donations for club, suite, season, group and mini plans at Oregon State University Athletics.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
